column1: # First matching rule wins. Keep specific rules above wildcard defaults.
models/dogfooding/adequacy/pass.pf|Obl_A_exec|UNSAT|Pass fixture must close the selected adequacy obligation (counterexample is UNSAT)|required
models/dogfooding/adequacy/fail.pf|Obl_A_exec|UNSAT|Fail fixture intentionally violates the selected adequacy obligation to produce a counterexample|required
*|*|SAT|Default fallback for commands outside the selected adequacy fixture contract|optional
